headline: Does Middle East Robotaxi Rollout Reframe the Scale Economics Story for WeRide (WRD)?
summary: WeRide Inc. and Uber Technologies, Inc. have launched Abu Dhabi’s first commercial robotaxi service in the city center, extending coverage to about 70% of the emirate’s core areas with a fleet that has quadrupled since December 2024 and now includes more than 200 robotaxis in the Middle East. The partners have also committed to deploy at least 1,200 robotaxis across Abu Dhabi, Dubai, and Riyadh by 2027, underscoring WeRide’s early lead in large-scale autonomous vehicle deployment in a region...
